title: Optical Delusion (Mail Order Massacres Book 2)
features: Put on a pair of “X-Ray” glasses and things will never look the same! These almost magical specs will make you the hit of the party! Astonishing three-dimensional X-Ray visions of what your friends—and girls—look like under their clothes! And all for just $1.

Martin Blackstone punishes his son for wasting his allowance on a pair of flimsy cardboard sunglasses X-ray vision . . . yeah, right. Martin tries them on just for the hell of it—and all they do is give him a headache . . .

Until he sees things he can’t possibly be seeing. Glimpses of things on the other side of a wall or beneath someone’s clothing. He wants to believe it’s just his overactive imagination but the “X-Ray” specs actually work. Then the fun novelty becomes a waking nightmare when the glasses burn into his face and he starts seeing horrifying apocalyptic visions no mortal man was ever meant to see. Images that alter his very personality—from a husband and father to a bloodthirsty homicidal maniac . . .Because sometimes you can see
description: "[A] hilarious creature-feature gorefest from pulp horror maven Shea.Twisted humor and campy horror. Those looking for a brain break and a bloody mess with revel in this promising series launch." -
"[Shea has] shown us he can tackle characterization, facts as well as fiction, and mix it all up into an incredible story. Highly recommended!"
